  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:leno_es_20070518_2_0050402</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>leno_es_20070518_2_0050402</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Ordenar vocablos por orden alfabético</string>
            <string language="en">Sorting words in alphabetical order</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sortieren von von Wörtern in alphabetischer 
Reihenfolge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Trier des mots dans l'ordre alphabétique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Classificando palavras na ordem alfabética</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ordinamento delle parole nell'ordine alfabetico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταξινομώντας λέξεις κατά αλφαβητική σειρά</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Conocer el orden correcto de las letras que forman nuestro abecedario. Escribir la letra que va delante y detrás de cada una de las letras propuestas.</string>
            <string language="en">Acquaintance with the right order of the letters in the Spanish alphabet. The student must write down the letter that goes before and after each of the letters presented.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Ordenar vocablos</string>
            <string language="en">Sorting words</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Lengua Castellana y Literatura</string>
            <string language="en">Castilian and Literature</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bekanntschaft mit der rechten Ordnung der Zeichen
im spanischen Alphabet. Der Kursteilnehmer muß den Brief 
notieren, der vorher und nachher jedes der dargestellten Zeichen geht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Connaissance avec la bonne commande des lettres 
dans l'alphabet espagnol. L'étudiant doit noter la lettre qui 
va avant et après chacune des lettres présentées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conhecimento com a ordem direita das letras no 
alfabeto espanhol. O estudante deve escrever para baixo a letra 
que vai before.and.after cada uma das letras apresentadas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Conoscenza con il giusto ordine delle lettere 
nell'alfabeto spagnolo. L'allievo deve annotare la lettera che 
va prima e dopo ciascuna delle lettere presentate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξοικείωση με τη σωστή κατάταξη των επιστολών στο 
ισπανικό αλφάβητο. Ο σπουδαστής πρέπει να γράψει κάτω την 
επιστολή που πηγαίνει πριν και μετά από κάθε μια από τις 
επιστολές που παρουσιάζονται.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sortieren von von Wörtern</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Castilian und Literatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Trier des mots</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Castillan et littérature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Classificando palavras</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Castilian e literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ordinamento delle parole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Castilian e letteratura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταξινομώντας λέξεις</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καστιλιάνος και λογοτεχνία</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
